solution_line_template: Angie earned {angie_salary} and paid {necessities} for necessities, so she had {angie_salary} - {necessities} = $<<{angie_salary}-{necessities}={after_necessities}>>{after_necessities} left.
Angie had {angie_leftover} left after paying taxes, so her share of the taxes was {after_necessities}- {angie_leftover} = $20 this month.
